name: Runaway Granny
description:
Welcome To Runaway Granny! The game where you can be a granny and run!

--Game Details--
Coins - Gain score
Cellphones - Minus Score (Scam Caller)

Grey Vitamin Boxes - Gain Health 
Red Pill Boxes - Minus Health
Barriers - Minus Health
Brown Box - No Highscore Allowed
